statements: DELETE FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE source = 'Cybersecurity' AND indicator_type = 'IP' AND indicator_value = '192.168.1.1';
DELETE FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE indicator_type = 'IP' AND description LIKE '%malicious%';
DELETE FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_name='Phishing Attack' AND timestamp < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM Verified_Threats WHERE verification_status = true;
DELETE FROM Verified_Threats WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM IncidentReports WHERE org_id = 2 AND incident_id = 3;
